FROM auctProduct a WHERE 1 = 1
AND acprDelNy = 1 AND acprDelNy = 0
AND acprStatusCd = 55 AND acprStatusCd = 56 AND acprStatusCd = 57 AND acprStatusCd = 58
AND a.regDateTime BETWEEN #{shProductDateStart} AND #{shProductDateEnd} AND a.modDateTime BETWEEN #{shProductDateStart} AND #{shProductDateEnd}
AND acprName LIKE concat('%',#{shAcprProductName},'%')
AND a.acprSeq LIKE concat('%',#{shProductValue},'%') AND a.acprProductName LIKE concat('%',#{shProductValue},'%') AND a.acprDetails LIKE concat('%',#{shProductValue},'%')
limit #{startRnumForMysql} , #{rowNumToShow}
mapper.select:
SELECT * ,b.ifmmName ,b.ifmmId FROM auctProduct a left join infrMember b on b.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq and a.acprDefaultNy = 1 WHERE 1=1
order by acprSeq

SELECT a.acprSeq ,a.acprProductName ,a.acprProductNameEng ,a.acprCategory ,a.acprStatusCd ,a.acprPickNy ,a.acprDetails ,a.acprDetailsEng ,a.acprPickupCd ,a.acprStartDate ,a.acprEndDate ,a.acprPriceStart ,a.acprPriceNow ,a.acpsPolicy ,a.acprHits ,a.acprAuctionTry ,a.acprDelNy ,a.regIp ,a.regSeq ,a.regDevice ,a.regDateTime ,a.regDateTimeSvr ,a.modIp ,a.modSeq ,a.modDevice ,a.modDateTime ,a.modDateTimeSvr ,b.ifmmName ,b.ifmmId ,b.ifmmNickname ,b.ifmmDob FROM auctProduct a left join infrMember b on b.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq and a.acprDefaultNy = 1 WHERE 1=1 and a.acprDelNy = 0 and a.acprSeq = #{acprSeq} order by a.acprSeq
mapper.update: UPDATE infrCodeGroup SET ifcgDelNy = 1 where 1 = 1 and ifcgSeq = #{ifcgSeq}
mapper.select:
select a.ifmmSeq ,a.ifmmAdminNy ,a.ifmmDormancyNy ,a.ifmmName ,a.ifmmNickname ,a.ifmmId ,a.ifmmGrade ,a.ifmmGenderCd ,a.ifmmDob ,a.ifmmSaveCd ,a.ifmmDelNy ,a.regDateTime ,b.ifmpNumber from infrMember a left join infrMemberPhone b on b.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq where 1=1
AND ifmmDelNy = 1 AND ifmmDelNy = 0
AND ifmmDormancyNy = 1 AND ifmmDormancyNy = 0

limit #{startRnumForMysql} , #{rowNumToShow}

SELECT * ,b.ifmmName ,b.ifmmId ,b.ifmmNickname FROM auctProduct a left join infrMember b on b.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq and a.acprDefaultNy = 1 WHERE 1=1 And acprDelNy = 0 order by acprSeq
